summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to community development; accepting a grant from the Washington State Department of Community, Trade and Economic Development and authorizing a grant agreement; amending the 1994 Annual Budget to appropriate such grant funds for selected capital projects of the Department of Parks and Recreation and to reallocate 1994 CDBG funds from such projects to the Office of Economic Development for small business lending; authorizing an amendment to the City's 1994 CDBG Final Statement; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
